com.structed.dal

Class LazyReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.structed.dal.StandardReader
      • com.structed.dal.LazyReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reader

    public class LazyReader
extends StandardReader
    This class reads the examples on demand It gets as input a file with the paths to all the data and reads each example by the algorithm's demand

      • readData

        public InstancesContainer readData(java.lang.String path,
                          java.lang.String dataSpliter,
                          java.lang.String valueSpliter)
        a Lazy reader, it reads only the paths to the data and not the data itself this reader will read the actual data on demand
        Specified by:
        readData in interface Reader
        Overrides:
        readData in class StandardReader
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the data
        dataSpliter - the splitter between the data values
        valueSpliter - the separator between the index of the feature to the feature value
        Returns:
        an InstanceContainer object which contains all the data
